


<!-- @namespace    sugar.js.is -->
<!-- @name    isString -->

# ```js isString ```


Check if the passed value is a js String

## Parameters

- **value**  Mixed: The value to check



## Example (js)

```js
import isString from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/is/String'
if (isString({}) {
  // do something
}
```
